values: Our journal is

I've been wondering something for a very long time now. I've been wondering why you all live in Heather's system knowing how they feel about me and the simple fact you were created for me and Renee and those in my system and Renee's. But yet you do not reside here... You reside elsewhere. Is there a reason for that. If so I would like an answer as well if there isn't then I will release you from the bargain you've made with me because I honestly do not want any help from anyone in Heather's system any further since I'm blamed for everything that goes wrong. Including the bs about Monica being my fuck up. Which isn't the truth because I didn't make Monica a nyghtmare she made herself on years ago. *shrugs and sighs* just shakes her head and goes back to spending time with hubby before bed. I would like an answer to my questions within the next week or so. Because if I don't get an answer by then I'll just terminate our bargain under the pretense you have no reason for not residing in my system.

Brandi

Edited: 09-06-05
Bargain has been terminated. I've been managing fine on my own for a while now. I will do just fine.  
Brandi

We have done as you've asked. However Nikki will never step foot in Heather's room ever again. She has cut all ties with you and everyone else. She's tired of the fucking bullshit and the fucking games. As well Nikki has banned Renee from speaking to sj or any of sj's alters period. Because of the childish bullshit.

Blake

Edited: 09-06-05

*shakes Her head as She watches Nikki fume because of things she's over heard lately. Nikki feels like she's being blamed for everything that's going wrong. Just shuts up and goes back to spending time with Her children and hopes Justin's alright since Myself and Tyrone weren't able to find Him.

Blake

Edited: 10-11-05

Renee can speak with anyone in sj's system or whomever she wishes at this point.

We're removing people who haven't added us to their journals. Also we're doing some house cleaning if you wish to remain on any of PantherHouse Member's Journals then you will need to comment to the FO Banners on the journals. List of the journals and dates for the fo banners will be following. Till then some will be removed and wonder why.

Journal Listing and Dates:

Ph which is this one of course= <lj user="pantherhouse"> Date: 01/23/2005
Brandi/Nikki= <lj user="angelboi79"> Date: 03/27/2008
MoonDragonClan= <lj user="silverdarkmoon"> Date: 06/01/2005
The reason we're doing this is because we're only going to leave those on the journals that do wish to be there. So please comment if you wish to added to the journals or wish to remain there.

Thanks the members of PantherHouse
